name: Solar Grazers
description:
Move you sheep around and let them graze your pasture, just make sure not to leave them in one spot for too long.

Controls

  • Left Click to grab/drop sheep
  • Mouse move to drag sheep around
  • Click the Fence button to enter build mode for your electric fence
    • Left Click to build/destroy existing fence
    • Right Click to exit build mode
  • Click the Turn button to advance to the next week

A game prototype made for the Regenerate Game Jam 2022. Sadly, I did not get to finish up my core game loop, so the game will send you back to the main menu after you reach the end of the 6 month game period.

The goal is to move your sheep around so that they graze the grass in your field, but you do not want to over graze any particular spot too much.

I had a lot of fun working on this game for this jam, and I have a better understanding of the TileMap system in Godot and how to store unique data for tiles after this, and also a headache. :)
